extendedInfo.description: The WRKO Talks app is now available for your Android device!- Live streaming: Listen to Boston's Talk Station, AM 680 WRKO anywhere in the world! The Kuhner Report with Jeff Kuhner will cover the cutting-edge, hot-button political issues of the day from 6-9am and 11am-12pm while The Financial Exchange with Barry Armstrong gives a look into the financial world from 9am-11am.Rush Limbaugh, the man who reshaped the political landscape with his entertaining and informative brand of conservatism, is on the air from 12pm-3pm. Finally, you don't want to miss WRKO's National Radio Hall of Famer Howie Carr, as he keeps you informed and entertained from 3pm-7pm with a barrage of star guests every day.- Audio & Video on Demand: WRKO's Audio on Demand includes the latest interviews with the best political newsmakers, analysts, and so much more from The Howie Carr Show, The Kuhner Report, and The Financial Exchange. You can also watch videos of WRKO's personalities.- The WRKO Talks app is a must have for Boston news junkies and for anyone looking to stay up-to-date and in touch with the latest in Boston and National politics anywhere you take your Android device!

reviews.title: Love the app!!
reviews.comment: Can\'t get a.m. stations in my work, so this app is awesome cause I love listening to khuner(with exception of cooksey) Carr and the rest of the crew...best app for local personality....
reviews.author: Brian Akeley

reviews.title: Great app for ex-New Englander
reviews.comment: This is an update to my previous review.  Initially I used this app on my Motorola Droid.  I\'ve upgraded my phone to a Galaxy Nexus and love the app equally as much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love rko
reviews.comment: I hate this app drops out and spends to much time buffering it makes listening impossible.
reviews.author: W. Anthony Whittemore

reviews.title: Droid 4 user
reviews.comment: Constantly drops feed. Sometimes after 30 seconds, sometimes 30 minutes. Doesn\'t seem like a buffering issue. Just drops. Too bad because when it works, it\'s great other than being a battery pig.
reviews.author: Michael Nelson

reviews.comment: App keeps shutting itself off. App spends to much time buffering.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I have downloaded this to my HTC EVO, when I click play it just keeps saying buffering, but it never plays.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buffering audio
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my Droid 4. Buffering audio forever. Does work flawlessly on an Optimus V_
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Buffering audio forever. Please fix this!
reviews.author: Ethan Michel

reviews.title: Connection
reviews.comment: It never streams audio for me :(  Droid X
reviews.author: A Google User
